project.title: Digital Product Creator
project.description: Back office tool to increase efficiency of the Pillar sales team A key task for them is to work with influencers and help them launch on the Pillar platform with succesful lead magnets and digital products. This tool enables them to enter a topic and type of digital product they would like to make and automatically generates an editable outline which then generates the first draft of the digital product that can then be uploaded to canva for styling.
